verses.text: Truly \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add even\add* to such as are of a \w clean|strong="H1249"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.\f + \fr 73.1 \ft of: or, for\f*\f + \fr 73.1 \ft Truly: or, Yet\f*\f + \fr 73.1 \ft of…: Heb. clean of heart\f*
But as for me, my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* were \w almost|strong="H4592"\w* \w gone|strong="H5186"\w*; my \w steps|strong="H0838"\w* had well \w nigh|strong="H0369"\w* \w slipped|strong="H8210"\w*.
For I was \w envious|strong="H7065"\w* at the \w foolish|strong="H1984"\w*, \add when\add* I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w prosperity|strong="H7965"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.

For \add there are\add* no \w bands|strong="H2784"\w* in their \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: but their \w strength|strong="H0193"\w* \add is\add* \w firm|strong="H1277"\w*.\f + \fr 73.4 \ft firm: Heb. fat\f*

They \add are\add* not in \w trouble|strong="H5999"\w* \add as other\add* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*; neither are they \w plagued|strong="H5060"\w* \w like|strong="H5973"\w* \add other\add* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.\f + \fr 73.5 \ft in…: Heb. in the trouble of other men\f*\f + \fr 73.5 \ft like: Heb. with\f*

Therefore \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* compasseth them about as a \w chain|strong="H6059"\w*; \w violence|strong="H2555"\w* \w covereth|strong="H5848"\w* them \add as\add* a \w garment|strong="H7897"\w*.

Their \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* stand \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with \w fatness|strong="H2459"\w*: they have \w more|strong="H5674"\w* than \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* could \w wish|strong="H4906"\w*.\f + \fr 73.7 \ft have…: Heb. pass the thoughts of the heart\f*

They are \w corrupt|strong="H4167"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w wickedly|strong="H7451"\w* \add concerning\add* \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w*: they \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w loftily|strong="H4791"\w*.

They \w set|strong="H8371"\w* their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* against the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* through the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Therefore his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w hither|strong="H1988"\w*: and \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* of a \w full|strong="H4392"\w* \add cup\add* are wrung \w out|strong="H4680"\w* to them.
And they \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, How doth \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*? and is \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1844"\w* in the most \w High|strong="H5945"\w*?

Behold, these \add are\add* the \w ungodly|strong="H7563"\w*, who \w prosper|strong="H7961"\w* in the \w world|strong="H5769"\w*; they \w increase|strong="H7685"\w* \add in\add* \w riches|strong="H2428"\w*.

Verily I have \w cleansed|strong="H2135"\w* my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \add in\add* \w vain|strong="H7385"\w*, and \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* in \w innocency|strong="H5356"\w*.

For all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long have I been \w plagued|strong="H5060"\w*, and \w chastened|strong="H8433"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 73.14 \ft chastened: Heb. my chastisement was\f*

If I \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w speak|strong="H5608"\w* \w thus|strong="H3644"\w*; behold, I should \w offend|strong="H0898"\w* \add against\add* the \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* of thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

When I \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* to \w know|strong="H3045"\w* this, it \add was\add* too \w painful|strong="H5999"\w* for \w me|strong="H5869"\w*;\f + \fr 73.16 \ft too…: Heb. labour in mine eyes\f*
Until I \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w*; \add then\add* \w understood|strong="H0995"\w* I their \w end|strong="H0319"\w*.
Surely thou didst \w set|strong="H7896"\w* them in slippery \w places|strong="H2513"\w*: thou castedst them \w down|strong="H5307"\w* into \w destruction|strong="H4876"\w*.

How are they \add brought\add* into \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, as in a \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*! they are \w utterly|strong="H5486"\w* \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w* with \w terrors|strong="H1091"\w*.

As a \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* when \add one\add* \w awaketh|strong="H6974"\w*; \add so\add*, O \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, when thou \w awakest|strong="H5782"\w*, thou shalt \w despise|strong="H0959"\w* their \w image|strong="H6754"\w*.
Thus my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* was \w grieved|strong="H2556"\w*, and I was \w pricked|strong="H8150"\w* in my \w reins|strong="H3629"\w*.

So \w foolish|strong="H1198"\w* \add was\add* I, and \w ignorant|strong="H3045"\w*: I was \add as\add* a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* before thee.\f + \fr 73.22 \ft ignorant: Heb. I knew not\f*\f + \fr 73.22 \ft before: Heb. with\f*
Nevertheless I \add am\add* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* with thee: thou hast \w holden|strong="H0270"\w* \add me\add* by my \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.
Thou shalt \w guide|strong="H5148"\w* me with thy \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* me \add to\add* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.
Whom have I in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \add but thee\add*? and \add there is\add* none upon \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add that\add* I \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* beside thee.

My \w flesh|strong="H7607"\w* and my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w faileth|strong="H3615"\w*: \add but\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* the \w strength|strong="H6697"\w* of my \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and my \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 73.26 \ft strength: Heb. rock\f*
For, lo, they that are \w far|strong="H7369"\w* from thee shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*: thou hast \w destroyed|strong="H6789"\w* all them that go a \w whoring|strong="H2181"\w* from thee.

\w But|strong="H0589"\w* \add it is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for me to draw \w near|strong="H7132"\w* to \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: I have \w put|strong="H7896"\w* my \w trust|strong="H4268"\w* in the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, that I may \w declare|strong="H5608"\w* all thy \w works|strong="H4399"\w*.
